short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring some cuteness to your new tab with the Hello Kitty Live Wallpaper!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring the iconic Hello Kitty in a charming design, this wallpaper adds a playful and joyful vibe to your browsing experience. Easily access your favorite websites with popular shortcuts, add custom links, and stay organized with the built-in calendar and clock. Search the web effortlessly using your default search engine.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Delight in Hello Kitty’s adorable and vibrant design.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Quickly visit your most-visited websites.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your tab with links you use most.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Keep track of your schedule with the integrated calendar and clock.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Seamlessly search the web using your preferred search engine.
Explore more extensions, view our Privacy Policy, or uninstall quickly via the provided links.
